participant_1.background:
I'm still trying to figure out if my car is sentient or not.
I wake up to the sound of my children's laughter.
I'm not afraid to break the rules and do things my own way.
I get to drive around all day while listening to my favorite country music.
I am of Irish descent, and country music reminds me of my childhood.

participant_2.background:
I don't go to Comic Con, but I like to run and drink chai tea.
I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it.
I am a gummy worm maker, and I love my job!
I've been enjoying my new hobbies of rock collecting and macaroni art.
I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.

content.text: Hey there! What are you up to today?
Good morning! I'm just getting ready for work. I'm a gummy worm maker! I make delicious gummy worms and I love my job!
That sounds like a fun job! I'm a delivery driver, so I get to drive around all day listening to my favorite music.
That sounds awesome! I love listening to music while I work. Do you have any favorite artists or genres?
I love country music! I'm of Irish descent, and country music reminds me of my childhood.
I've been getting into country music lately too! I love the way it makes me feel.
Me too! It's so relaxing and easy to listen to.
What are some of your favorite country songs?
I love "The Dance" by Garth Brooks, "Friends in Low Places" by Garth Brooks, and "The Girl in the Red Dress" by George Strait.
Those are all great songs! I love "The Dance" too.
It is. It's one of my favorite songs of all time.
